NCS powered by The Challenge
NCSTHECHALLENGE.ORG
DON'T LET YOUR CHILD MISS OUT!
LAST FEW PLACES FOR NCS FEB 2015
Dear Parent/Guardian of {!Contact.Name},
Recently {!Contact.FirstName} expressed an interest in doing NCS but hasn’t yet taken part.
There are a few spaces left for the February NCS programme in your area from 14-20 Feb. Make sure {!Contact.FirstName} doesn’t miss out on this once-in-a-lifetime opportunity by signing up for February, and don’t worry about fitting it in over half term with mocks and course work? - There’s time set aside for this.
Don’t just take our word for it – here’ a recent TV ad which feature parents talking about what their son or daughter has gained from NCS…
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5LobrFZDIyA
FIND OUT MORE & SIGN UP
There’s lots more information on our website and {!Contact.FirstName} can sign up here: https://bookings.ncsthechallenge.org/
Make sure {!Contact.FirstName} doesn’t miss out on the experience of a lifetime.
VISIT NCSTHECHALLENGE.ORG NOW
